definition: word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

pinyin: dan1 ci2 chan3 sheng1 qi4 mo2 xing2

sentences.english: All you have to do to win is unscramble the words here to find four names of birds.
sentences.chinese: 只要你能从这些单词中找到四种鸟的名称你就赢了。

sentences.english: He bought an English-Chinese dictionary in order to look up the words he doesn't know.
sentences.chinese: 他买了本英汉字典，以便查找他不认识的单词。

sentences.english: Avoid abbreviations, because people tend to spell out words in searches.
sentences.chinese: 避免使用缩写，人们在搜索时，一般会拼写出单词。

sentences.english: Construct your own sentences using the words that you have noted in your dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 用你在个人词库中所写下的单词进行遣词造句。

sentences.english: On my first day of school, I didn't speak a word of English.
sentences.chinese: 当我第一天上学时，我连一个英文单词都说不出口。

sentences.english: Read the word clearly and don't swallow a syllable.
sentences.chinese: 把单词读清晰，不要吞掉音节。

sentences.english: It turned out that Puck knew more English words than Prudle knew.
sentences.chinese: 成果证实帕克控制地英文单词比普鲁多更多。

sentences.english: In the past three years we have learned two thousand English words.
sentences.chinese: 三年来我们学了二千个英语单词。

sentences.english: It refers to the formation of new words by adding affixes to other words or morphemes.
sentences.chinese: 将词缀加入其他单词或词素以构成新词的方法。

sentences.english: Teacher points the words and students read after it.
sentences.chinese: 师用拍手的方式，让学生跟读几个单词的规范语音。

sentences.english: A dictionary is a list of words or expressions defined by the user.
sentences.chinese: 一个字典就是指由用户定义的一组单词或表达式。

sentences.english: Can you identify the part of speech of this word?
sentences.chinese: 能说出这个单词的词类吗？

sentences.english: Create your own word list and practice them to perfection.
sentences.chinese: 创建您自己的单词表和实践完美。

sentences.english: Circle the phonemes in each word in a different colour pencil.
sentences.chinese: 用不同的颜色笔圈出每一个单词的音素。

sentences.english: I want to write on the blackboard, so I have to wipe all the words here out.
sentences.chinese: 我想在黑板上写字，所以我必须把上面的单词都擦去。

sentences.english: The character which when preceded by an escape character represents the word-end boundary assertion.
sentences.chinese: 前跟转义字符用于判断单词结束边界的字符。

definition: new word (in textbook)/word that is unfamiliar or not yet studied/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]
to pronounce a word after mentally processing its spelling/(phonics) blending
(of a pupil) to write down (in a dictation exercise)/dictation/(music) to transcribe by ear
part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
new character (in textbook)/character that is unfamiliar or not yet studied
radical of a compound word (in European language)
